text:
Zipcar - Boston, MA

Work in the awesome fort point district at our nice new location.

Build applications for use or support of people you can actually meet (local members, friends, family).

Get a sweet Zipcar membership discount.

Good pay.

Get to work with technologies like Ruby on Rails, Backbone.

Senior Software Engineer http://jobvite.com/m?3Zomwgw0 Software Engineer http://jobvite.com/m?3npmwgwp
